Summary: saw light went outside watched it come from sw to ne and disappear.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around October 27th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswas sitting in house watching tv,saw light out back door went outside bright orange object coming out of sw no idea what it was it as heading ne, ran thru house got cell phone out of pocket tryed to call son no answer,yelled at wife in living room to come out,we were able to see it disappear in ne.object made no sound that i could hear shaped like a pill capsule. when we turned around saw bright white light almost over head coming from nw to se wife and i both thought it looked like space station, see today it was. orange light looked at least 10 times bigger than space station but have no idea how far away it was.never saw any thing like this before sure would like to know what it was,had to be a lot of people see this.
